amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service by $5 million for the purpose of combating sudden oak death.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, offered en bloc, to increase funding by $5 million for the prevention of sudden oak death. The increase is offset by a reduction in funds for Agriculture Buildings and Facilities and Rental Payments account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hooley (OR) amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 160 (Roll no. 363).
